Package peril.helpers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIHandler
    The controller for all AI to Game interactions.
    AIHelper
    This class is responsible for retrieving and storing all the AI which will be used in the game.
    DirectoryHelper
    Provides the file paths to all the game assets.
    FunctionHelper
    This hold the functionality of every predefined Button in the game.
    ModelStateHelper
    A helper class for Game this object stores the instances of the various ModelStates.
    PlayerHelper
    A helper class for game which encapsulates the behaviours of the list of ModelPlayers.
    PointHelper
    Provides the point reward and cost amounts for in-game transactions..
    Test_UnitHelper
    Tests UnitHelper
    UnitHelper
    Stores the ModelUnits that are currently in use.
